title: My phone won't even show my Bluetooth device in settings, what can I do so I can use my device? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s likely the device you’re trying to connect requires a pairing step to connect the first time. I have some Bluetooth headphones that wouldn’t show up at all until I put them in pairing mode. Now whenever I turn them on the connect automatically, if my phone’s Bluetooth is on.
